content.text:
# Joanne Weir's Cooking Class

'Joanne Weir's Cooking Class' is a cooking show airing on PBS. Each episode features a novice student who is shown
how to prepare several related dishes. The program is presented by KQED, distributed by American Public Television and produced by [http://www.alacartetv.com A La Carte Communications].
